title: Birth of Muhammad ﷺ
description: Born in Mecca during the Year of the Elephant.

title: Death of Amina
description: Mother of Muhammad ﷺ passed away.

title: Marriage to Khadijah RA
description: Married Khadijah, his first and most beloved wife.

title: First Revelation
description: Angel Jibril revealed the first verses of the Qur'an.

title: Public Preaching Begins
description: Islam is preached openly in Mecca.

title: Hijrah to Medina
description: Migration to Medina and start of Islamic calendar (AH).

title: Battle of Badr
description: First major battle against Quraysh. Muslims victorious.

title: Battle of the Trench
description: Medina defended against siege with strategic trench.

title: Treaty of Hudaybiyyah
description: Peace treaty signed with the Quraysh.

title: Farewell Pilgrimage
description: Final sermon delivered at Mount Arafat.

title: Passing of the Prophet ﷺ
description: Muhammad ﷺ passed away in Medina.
